thumb.description: 下記リンクにて、この動画内のBGMを販売しています！The background music in this video is for sale at the link below!👉https://bgms.booth.pm/items/6877124----🎧Youtube music👉https://youtu.be/LVyj2Icalrc🎧Spotify👉https://open.spotify.com/intl-ja/artist/6VLPxVwd1q9orMwrazrYll 🎧Apple Music👉https://music.apple.com/jp/artist/1804546728 🎧Amazon Music👉https://music.amazon.co.jp/artists/B0F2HZSZT6/honorable-japanese-song ----#lofi #funk #funkopop #chillbeats #studymusic #backgroundmusic #instrumental #chillhop #studybeats #relaxingbeats #BGM #instrumental
